        public T body()
        Description copied from interface: ValidatableResponseLogSpec
        Logs only the content of the body. The body will be pretty-printed by default if content-type is either XML, JSON or HTML.
        Specified by:

      • body

        public T body(boolean shouldPrettyPrint)
        Description copied from interface: ValidatableResponseLogSpec
        Logs only the content of the body and pretty-print the body if specified. Note that pretty-printing can only take place if the content-type is either XML, JSON or HTML.
        Specified by:
        body in interface ValidatableResponseLogSpec<T extends ValidatableResponseOptions<T,R>,R extends ResponseBody<R> & ResponseOptions<R>>
        Parameters:
        shouldPrettyPrint - true if the body should be pretty-printed, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        The specification

      • all

        public T all()
        Description copied from interface: ValidatableResponseLogSpec
        Logs everything in the response, including e.g. headers, cookies, body. Pretty-prints the body if content-type is either either XML, JSON or HTML..
